template.heading: BETWEEN:
template.content:
[CompanyName]
Having its registered office at [CompanyAddress]
(Hereinafter referred to as 'the Company')

AND

[EmployeeName]
R/o [EmployeeAddress]
(Hereinafter referred to as 'the Employee')

template.heading: RECITALS
template.content: WHEREAS the Company desires to employ the Employee and the Employee desires to be employed by the Company on the terms and conditions hereinafter set forth;

template.heading: NOW THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants contained herein, the parties agree as follows:
1. EMPLOYMENT
template.content: The Company hereby employs the Employee as [Position] and the Employee hereby accepts such employment subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement.

template.heading: 2. COMMENCEMENT AND DURATION
template.content: The employment shall commence on [StartDate] and shall continue until terminated in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement.

template.heading: 3. PROBATION PERIOD
template.content: The Employee shall be on probation for a period of [Probation] months from the date of joining. During this period, either party may terminate this Agreement by giving one month's written notice.

template.heading: 4. SALARY AND BENEFITS
template.content: The Company shall pay the Employee a monthly salary of Rs. [Salary] plus such benefits as may be applicable according to Company policy.

template.heading: 5. WORKING HOURS
template.content: The normal working hours shall be [WorkingHours] hours per day, Monday to Friday, or as may be required by the Company from time to time.

template.heading: 6. DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
template.content: The Employee shall perform such duties as may be assigned by the Company from time to time and shall devote his/her full time and attention to the business of the Company.

template.heading: 7. CONFIDENTIALITY
template.content: The Employee shall not disclose any confidential information of the Company to any third party during or after the termination of employment.

template.heading: 8. TERMINATION
template.content: After the probation period, either party may terminate this Agreement by giving [NoticePeriod] months' written notice or payment in lieu thereof.

template.heading: 9. GOVERNING LAW
template.content: This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of India and any disputes shall be subject to the jurisdiction of courts at [CompanyLocation].

template.heading: IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this Agreement on the date first written above.
